definitions.text: a position in a grammatical linguistic construction in which a variety of alternative units are interchangeable
examples: he developed a version of slot grammar

definitions.text: a small slit (as for inserting a coin or depositing mail)
examples: he put a quarter in the slot

definitions.text: a time assigned on a schedule or agenda
examples: the TV program has a new time slot

definitions.text: a position in a hierarchy or organization
examples: Bob Dylan occupied the top slot for several weeks
she beat some tough competition for the number one slot

definitions.text: the trail of an animal (especially a deer)
examples: he followed the deer's slot over the soft turf to the edge of the trees

definitions.text: (computer) a socket in a microcomputer that will accept a plug-in circuit board
examples: the PC had three slots for additional memory

definitions.text: a slot machine that is used for gambling
examples: they spend hours and hours just playing the slots
